query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO EVENT_CRF (STUDY_EVENT_ID, CRF_VERSION_ID, DATE_INTERVIEWED, INTERVIEWER_NAME, COMPLETION_STATUS_ID, STATUS_ID, ANNOTATIONS, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED, STUDY_SUBJECT_ID, VALIDATE_STRING, VALIDATOR_ANNOTATIONS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?, ?, ?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE EVENT_CRF SET STUDY_EVENT_ID=? , CRF_VERSION_ID=? , DATE_INTERVIEWED=? , INTERVIEWER_NAME=? , COMPLETION_STATUS_ID=? , STATUS_ID=? , ANNOTATIONS=? , DATE_COMPLETED=? , VALIDATOR_ID=? , DATE_VALIDATE=? , DATE_VALIDATE_COMPLETED=? , VALIDATOR_ANNOTATIONS=? , VALIDATE_STRING=? , STUDY_SUBJECT_ID=? , DATE_UPDATED=sysdate , UPDATE_ID=? , ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE_STATUS=? WHERE EVENT_CRF_ID=?

query.name: findAllByStudyEvent
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_crf WHERE study_event_id=? order by event_crf_id asc

query.name: findAllByStudyEventAndCrfOrCrfVersionOid
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_crf WHERE study_event_id=? AND crf_version_id in ( select crf_version.crf_version_id from crf_version left outer join crf on crf.crf_id=crf_version.crf_id where crf_version.oc_oid=? or crf.oc_oid=?)

query.name: findByPKAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT EC.* FROM event_crf EC, study_subject SS, study st WHERE EC.study_subject_id = SS.study_subject_id AND EC.event_crf_id = ? AND SS.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id = ? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: SELECT event_crf_id_seq.currval AS key from dual

query.name: findAllByCRF
query.sql: select ec.* from event_crf ec, crf c ,crf_version cv where ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id and c.crf_id=cv.crf_id and c.crf_id=?

query.name: findAllByCRFVersion
query.sql: select ec.* from event_crf ec, crf_version cv where ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id and cv.crf_version_id=?

query.name: findAllStudySubjectByCRFVersion
query.sql: select ec.*, ss.label, sed.name as sed_name, s.name as study_name from study_subject ss, study_event_definition sed, study s, study_event se, event_crf ec, crf_version cv where ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id and cv.crf_version_id=? AND (ec.status_id =1 or ec.status_id = 4) AND ss.study_subject_id = ec.study_subject_id AND se.study_event_definition_id = sed.study_event_definition_id AND s.study_id = ss.study_id AND ec.study_event_id = se.study_event_id

query.name: markCompleteIDE
query.sql: UPDATE EVENT_CRF SET DATE_COMPLETED=sysdate WHERE EVENT_CRF_ID=?

query.name: markCompleteDDE
query.sql: UPDATE EVENT_CRF SET DATE_VALIDATE_COMPLETED=sysdate WHERE EVENT_CRF_ID=?

query.name: findByEventCrfVersion
query.sql: select ec.* from event_crf ec, crf_version cv where ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id and ec.study_event_id=? and cv.crf_version_id=?

query.name: findByPKAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT E.* FROM event_crf E, study_subject S, study st WHERE E.study_subject_id = S.study_subject_id AND E.event_crf_id=? AND S.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id = ? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByEventSubjectVersion
query.sql: select ec.* from event_crf ec, crf_version cv where ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id and ec.study_event_id=? and cv.crf_version_id=? and ec.study_subject_id=?

query.name: findByEventCrfVersion
query.sql: select ec.* from event_crf ec, crf_version cv where ec.crf_version_id=cv.crf_version_id and ec.study_event_id=? and cv.crf_version_id=?
